listener.admin.livetable.listenerClass=Java class listener.admin.livetable.listenerEvents=Events listened to listener.admin.livetable.listenerName=Name listener.admin.livetable.actions=State
listener.admin.success.addListener=Listener [{0}] has been registered. listener.admin.success.removeListener=Listener [{0}] has been unregistered.
listener.admin.error.norights=You do not have administrative rights required to proceed with this tool. listener.admin.error.noListener=Failed to register/unregister listener: the listener [{0}] doesn't exist. listener.admin.error.addListener=Failed to register listener: The listener [{0}] is already registered. listener.admin.error.removeListener=Failed to unregister listener: The listener [{0}] is already unregistered.
